verses.verse: And they <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H3322>placed<s%> it <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it, and they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

When <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H5927>offering<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And he <S%H2505>distributed<s%> to <S%H3605>everyone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> to <S%H376>everyone<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> and a <S%H829>portion<s%> [of meat] and a <S%H809>raisin<s%> <S%H809>cake.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>appointed<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [as] <S%H8334>ministers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> even to <S%H2142>celebrate<s%> and to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

<S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H4932>second<s%> to him <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> [then] <S%H3262>Jeiel,<s%> <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> Obed-edom, and <S%H3262>Jeiel,<s%> with musical <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> <S%H5035>harps,<s%> <S%H3658>lyres;<s%> also <S%H623>Asaph<s%> [played] loud-sounding <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%>

and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> and <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> [blew] <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7218>first<s%> <S%H5414>assigned<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives<s%> to <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Oh <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H3045>Make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> His <S%H5949>deeds<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to Him, <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Him; <S%H7878>Speak<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H6381>wonders.<s%>
<S%H1984>Glory<s%> in His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> Let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and His <S%H5797>strength;<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> His <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> His <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>deeds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H6213>done,<s%> His <S%H4159>marvels<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> from His <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>
O <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> His <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H1121>Sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> His <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones!<s%>
He is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> His <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> which He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations,<s%>
[The covenant] <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> And His <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>
He also <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> it to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>statute,<s%> To <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>
<S%H559>Saying,<s%> "To you I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> As the <S%H9112>portion<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>"
When they were only a <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> Very <S%H4592>few,<s%> and <S%H1481>strangers<s%> in it,
And they <S%H1980>wandered<s%> about from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation,<s%> And from [one] <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%>
He <S%H5117>permitted<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress<s%> them, And He <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> for their <S%H5921>sakes,<s%> [saying,]
"Do not <S%H5060>touch<s%> My <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H4899>ones,<s%> And <S%H7489>do<s%> My <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7489>harm.<s%>"

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H1319>Proclaim<s%> good <S%H1319>tidings<s%> of His <S%H3444>salvation<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H5608>Tell<s%> of His <S%H9202>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> His <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>deeds<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised;<s%> He also is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H457>idols,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
<S%H1935>Splendor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> are <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, <S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H2304>joy<s%> are in His <S%H4725>place.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength.<s%>

<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> due His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H5375>Bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him; <S%H7812>Worship<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1927>array.<s%>

<S%H9123>Tremble<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> is <S%H3559>firmly<s%> <S%H3559>established,<s%> it will not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>

Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice;<s%> And let them <S%H559>say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns.<s%>"
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains;<s%> Let the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5970>exult,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it.

<S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%> will <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> For He is <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
O <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for [He is] <S%H2896>good;<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>

Then <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3467>"Save<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> And <S%H6908>gather<s%> us and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> To <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> And <S%H9576>glory<s%> in Thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>"

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> even to <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%> Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen,<s%>" and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

So he <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> as every day's <S%H1697>work<s%> <S%H1697>required;<s%>
and Obed-edom with <S%H68>his<s%> <S%H8346><s%> <S%H8083><s%> <S%H251>relatives;<s%> Obed-edom, also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> as <S%H7778>gatekeepers.<s%>

And [he left] <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%>

to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening,<s%> even according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And with them [were] <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and the <S%H7605>rest<s%> who were <S%H1305>chosen,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H9344>designated<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>

And with them [were] <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> [with] <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> for those who should <S%H8085>sound<s%> aloud, and [with] <S%H3627>instruments<s%> [for] the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H1004>household.<s%>
